Uses of Class
org.gm4java.im4java.GMOperation

  • Packages that use GMOperation 
    Package Description
    org.gm4java.im4java
    Provides the integration between gm4java and im4java.

    • Uses of GMOperation in org.gm4java.im4java

      Methods in org.gm4java.im4java that return GMOperation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GMOperation GMOperation.addImage(File file)
      Add image to operation.
      GMOperation GMOperation.addRawArg(String arg)
      Add raw text to the list of arguments.
      GMOperation GMOperation.drawText(String text, int offsetX, int offsetY)
      Draws text overlay on image with the upper-right corner defined by the offsetX and offsetY parameters.
      GMOperation GMOperation.font(String style, int size, String color)
      Defines font for text overlay.
      GMOperation GMOperation.gravity(GMOperation.Gravity value)
      Defines the gravity for geometry-based operations.
      GMOperation GMOperation.grayscale(int depth)
      Convert the image to grayscale (i.e.
      GMOperation GMOperation.limitThreads(int threadsPerProcess)
      Limits the number of threads used by the GraphicsMagick process during execution.
      GMOperation GMOperation.quality(double quality)
      Add option -quality to the GraphicsMagick commandline (see the documentation of GraphicsMagick for details).
      GMOperation GMOperation.resize(int width, int height, Collection<GMOperation.GeometryAnnotation> annotations)
      Resize source to desired target dimensions, using default resizing filter algorithm.
      GMOperation GMOperation.rotate(double degrees, GMOperation.RotationAnnotation annotation)
      Rotates the image, with empty triangles back-filled using default background color.
      GMOperation GMOperation.scale(int width, int height, Collection<GMOperation.GeometryAnnotation> annotations)
      Scale source to desired target dimensions, using simplified resizing algorithm with pixel averaging.
      GMOperation GMOperation.source(File file, Integer width, Integer height)
      Specifies the source image to convert.
      GMOperation GMOperation.stripProfiles()
      Strips out ICC profiles.
